question: A denial of service attack is ____.
options: aimed at disrupting legitimate use of a system

question: In a paired-password system, ____.
options: the computer supplies one part of a password and the user enters the other part
passwords must contain equal amounts of numbers and digits paired together
two users must enter their own separate password to gain access to the system

question: A ____ virus changes each time it is installed to avoid detection by antivirus software.
A ____ is a public key digitally signed by a trusted party.
Which of the following is true of SSL?
options: It provides security at the data-link layer.
It is a simple protocol with limited options.
It is commonly used for secure communication on the Internet.
